docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
MDAnalysis TUI can be installed using pip:

python -m pip install mda-tui

This will install MDAnalysis TUI along with all necessary dependencies.

docs.title: Getting started
docs.text:
Once you've installed MDAnalysis TUI, you can use the mda command from your terminal to launch the app.

See the transformations docs for details on transformations currently available in MDAnalysis TUI.

docs.title: Transformations
docs.text:
There are currently five transformations available in MDAnalysis TUI:

  • translate all atoms by a vector, which uses MDAnalysis.transformations.translate.translate
  • center atoms or molecule in a box, which uses MDAnalysis.transformations.translate.center_in_box
  • wrap atoms in a box, which uses MDAnalysis.transformations.wrap.wrap
  • unwrap atom group fragments, which uses MDAnalysis.transformations.wrap.unwrap
  • prevent atoms from jumping across periodic boundaries, which uses MDAnalysis.transformations.nojump.NoJump

docs.title: Center in box
docs.text: Center a group of atoms in a box using MDAnalysis.transformations.translate.center_in_box.

docs.title: No-jump
docs.text: Wrap atoms into the unit cell using MDAnalysis.transformations.nojump.NoJump.

docs.title: Translate
docs.text: Translate all atoms in your system by a given vector using MDAnalysis.transformations.translate.translate.

docs.title: Unwrap
docs.text: Unwrap an atom group so that its fragments are not split across periodic boundaries. Uses MDAnalysis.transformations.wrap.unwrap.

docs.title: Wrap
docs.text: Wrap atoms into the unit cell using MDAnalysis.transformations.wrap.wrap.
